v:doc:architecture-incose-paper.name: Architecture Document - INCOSE Paper Assurance Framework
v:doc:architecture-incose-paper.description: 4-layer SE architecture for the document assurance framework demonstrated in the INCOSE IS 2026 paper
v:doc:architecture-incose-paper.scope: A framework for verifying, validating, and assuring LLM-assisted documents using typed simplicial complexes with human accountability

v:doc:incose-paper-2026.name: Test-Driven Document Development - INCOSE IS 2026 Paper
v:doc:incose-paper-2026.description: Research paper demonstrating typed simplicial complex framework for verification, validation, and assurance with human accountability

v:doc:lifecycle-incose-paper.name: Engineering Lifecycle for INCOSE Paper Development
v:doc:lifecycle-incose-paper.description: Documents the systematic process for developing assured research papers within the typed simplicial complex framework

v:doc:literature-review-incose-paper.name: Literature Review - INCOSE IS 2026 Paper on Document Assurance Framework
v:doc:literature-review-incose-paper.description: Comprehensive literature review supporting the INCOSE paper on test-driven document development using typed simplicial complexes
v:doc:literature-review-incose-paper.topic: Document Verification, Validation, Assurance, and Accountability
v:doc:literature-review-incose-paper.search_strategy: Targeted search of IEEE standards, INCOSE publications, topology textbooks, and AI ethics frameworks

v:doc:novel-contributions-incose-paper.name: Novel Research Contributions - INCOSE IS 2026 Paper
v:doc:novel-contributions-incose-paper.description: Enumeration and ranking of intellectual contributions from the assurance framework research for the INCOSE IS 2026 submission

v:guidance:background-section.description: Quality criteria and best practices for writing excellent Background sections in INCOSE symposium papers

v:guidance:incose-literature-review.description: Quality criteria and best practices for creating excellent literature reviews supporting INCOSE papers

v:guidance:incose-paper-section.description: Quality criteria and best practices for writing excellent INCOSE symposium paper sections that resonate with reviewers

v:guidance:incose-paper.name: Guidance for INCOSE IS 2026 Research Paper
v:guidance:incose-paper.description: Comprehensive quality criteria, best practices, and evaluation guidance for creating an excellent INCOSE symposium paper that resonates with reviewers and practitioners

v:guidance:incose-self-demonstration.name: Guidance for INCOSE Self-Demonstrating Paper
v:guidance:incose-self-demonstration.description: Quality criteria for INCOSE papers that demonstrate their framework by being instances of it, with emphasis on coherence across supporting documents

v:guidance:introduction-section.name: Guidance for INCOSE Paper Introduction Section
v:guidance:introduction-section.description: Quality criteria and best practices for writing excellent Introduction sections in INCOSE symposium papers

v:spec:incose-literature-review.description: Defines structural requirements for literature review documents supporting INCOSE paper submissions

v:spec:incose-paper-section.description: Structural requirements for sections within an INCOSE symposium research paper, derived from INCOSE Conference LaTeX Template V1.2

v:spec:incose-paper.name: Specification for INCOSE IS 2026 Research Paper
v:spec:incose-paper.description: Comprehensive structural requirements for an INCOSE International Symposium 2026 research paper submission, derived from official Call for Submissions and INCOSE publication standards

v:spec:incose-self-demonstration.description: Extended specification for INCOSE papers that demonstrate their framework by being instances of it, requiring consistency with architecture, lifecycle, literature review, and novel contributions documents

v:spec:introduction-section.description: Detailed structural requirements for Introduction sections in INCOSE symposium papers

c:incose-paper-assurance.name: INCOSE Paper Assurance Audit Chart
c:incose-paper-assurance.description: Complete assurance network for the INCOSE IS 2026 paper with dual assurance (base + self-demonstration)
c:incose-paper-assurance.purpose: Demonstrate the assurance framework by showing how the INCOSE paper achieves dual assurance through two independent triangles
c:incose-paper-assurance.scope: 23 vertices including boundary complex, supporting document types, supporting document instances, paper content, and signer
